description: Arcsight TH Kafka & Logger Metrics + Node Metrics

panels.description:
This panel shows the default TH topics' EPS.
Use the query "A" as a reference to get the EPS from a non default topic.

targets.query:
#Example query to get the eps from a non default topic:
SELECT last("EPS_CUSTOM_TOPIC") as "CUSTOM_TOPIC" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)

SELECT LAST("EPS_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("EPS_th-binary_esm") as "th-binary_esm", LAST("EPS_th-cef-other") as "th-cef-other", LAST("EPS_th-syslog") as "th-syslog", LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro", LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics") as "th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics", LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-json-datastore") as "th-arcsight-json-datastore", LAST("EPS__schemas") as "_schemas" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host

panels.title: Topics EPS

panels.description: This panel shows the defaults topics' summed recent offsets. Use the query "A" as a reference to get the "Summed Recent Offset"from  a non default topic.

targets.query: SELECT LAST("TO_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("TO_th-binary_esm") as "th-binary_esm", LAST("TO_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro", LAST("TO_th-cef-other") as "th-cef-other", LAST("TO_th-syslog") as "th-syslog", LAST("TO___consumer_offsets") as "__consumer_offsets", LAST("TO__schemas") as "_schemas", LAST("TO_th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics") as "th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics", LAST("TO_th-arcsight-json-datastore") as "th-arcsight-json-datastore"FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY host fill(null)

panels.title: Topics' Summed Recent Offsets

panels.description:
This panel shows the consumers' lag.
Use the query "A" as a reference to get a specific consumer's lag.  For now this panel only shows metrics from consumers that DON'T have any space in their names, for example a consumer with the name "consumer_01" is valid but "consumer 01" is not.

targets.query:
#Example query to get a specific consumer's lag:
SELECT last("CUSTOM_NAME_TOPIC") as "CONSUMER_NAME Consuming From TOPIC" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)

SELECT last("com.arcsight.th.CEF_TEXT_ROUTING_1__LAG__Consuming_From__th-cef") as "CEF_TEXT_ROUTING_1  Consuming From  th-cef" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host"

SELECT last("metrics-processor__LAG__Consuming_From__th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics") as "metrics-processor  Consuming From  th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host"

SELECT last("com.arcsight.th.C2A__LAG__Consuming_From__th-cef") as "com.arcsight.th.C2A Consuming From  th-cef" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host"

panels.title: Consumers' Lag

panels.description: This panel shows how many brokers are shown in the Kafka Manager.

targets.query: SELECT LAST("Brokers_on_KM") as "Brokers on KM"FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter),  host

panels.title: Brokers on KM Over Time

targets.query: SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "Total Events" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY * fill(none)) GROUP BY host fill(none)
SELECT last("BPS_SLC") AS "Bytes/sec" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), Receiver_Type, host fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("BPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), Receiver_Type, host fill(none)
select last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server_m$/)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean(usage_system) + mean(usage_iowait) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu"
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu"
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu"
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu"
SELECT mean(load1) as load_1,mean(load5) as load_5,mean(load15) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT ( MEAN(load1) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_1, ( MEAN(load5) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_5, ( MEAN(load15) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "Inbound"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "Outbound" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host", "path"
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "path"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

title: TH&Logger (Multiple Instances) + Nodes Metrics
